name: DocBuilder and Hugo Extended
description: Installs docbuilder and hugo extended binaries.

autoPreview.description: Automatically start docbuilder preview server when container starts.

docsDir.description: Directory containing documentation source files for docbuilder preview.

livereloadPort.description: Port for LiveReload server (0 = auto-calculate as previewPort+3).

verbose.description: Enable verbose output for docbuilder preview.

vscodeLinks.description: Enable VS Code edit links in preview (opens files in editor via /_edit/ handler).

httpProxy.description: HTTP proxy URL for downloading binaries (e.g., http://proxy.example.com:3128)

httpsProxy.description: HTTPS proxy URL for downloading binaries (e.g., http://proxy.example.com:3128)

noProxy.description: Comma-separated list of hosts to exclude from proxying (e.g., localhost,127.0.0.1,.example.com)
